main.name: Cameron Peters
main.bio: Effective communicator with a diligent work ethic. Proficient in Microsoft Office and clientele software. 4+ years of experience in event management, finance, and content marketing.Seeking a role in marketing and event management.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to get in touch with me just state your name and your business and I will get back to you as soon as I get the chance.

resume.message: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Finance and Administrative Support Services Intern
work.description: Support the Director of Residence Life in the development and compilation of the Residence Life annual spending plan, mid-year reports, periodic reports, fee requests and other financial reports. Assist in the preparation of revenue projections and annual budgets related to vending commissions. Create and maintain various financial spreadsheets for tracking, recording, analyzing and reporting purposes. Also, advise Residence Hall Councils and the Residence Hall Association on finance processes and assist with coordinating requisitions, honorariums, and personal service agreements.

work.title: League Director
work.description: Head of children and adult recreation leagues. Oversee all staff, referees, umpires, and coaches. Schedule all games and staff assignments. Work with all coaches, staff, and athletes to promote the Town of Stratford's sport leagues.

work.title: Graduate Assistant
work.description: Support the marketing and promotion of services to education candidates. Leadership in event planning, delivery, design and execute marketing and social media campaigns. Provide direct service support to students, faculty, and school district partners.

work.title: Summer Full Time Intern
work.description: Over 500 hours of recruiting, general advertising, and marketing for the Nutmeg State Games and Connecticut Masters Games. Day to day management of web pages, and game day operations while overseeing short term staff.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Over 300 hours of experience tutoring college students in psychology,sociology, sport management, recreation, public speaking, music, and management.
